trans-unit.source: This argument is followed by a header name, which can include the final colon, but it is not required. Case is ignored for set, append, merge, add, unset and edit. The header name for echo is case sensitive and may be a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 此参数后跟 header 名称，该名称可以包含最后的冒号，但这不是必需的。 set ， append ， merge ， add ， unset 和 edit 大小写将被忽略。 echo 的 header 名称区分大小写，并且可以是正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: This argument is followed by a header name, which can include the final colon, but it is not required. Case is ignored. For set, append, merge and add a value is given as the third argument. If a value contains spaces, it should be surrounded by double quotes. For unset, no value should be given. value may be a character string, a string containing format specifiers or a combination of both. The supported format specifiers are the same as for the Header, please have a look there for details. For edit both a value and a replacement are required, and are a regular expression and a replacement string respectively.
trans-unit.target: 此参数后跟标题名称，该名称可以包含最后的冒号，但这不是必需的。大小写被忽略。对于 set ， append ， merge 和 add 一个 value 作为第三个参数给出。如果 value 包含空格，则应该用双引号将其引起来。对于 unset ，不应该给出任何 value 。 value 可以是字符串，包含格式说明符的字符串或两者的组合。支持的格式说明符与 Header 相同，请查看那里的详细信息。对于 edit 既有 value 和 replacement 是必需的，分别是正则表达式和替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: This arrangement uses more advanced mod_rewrite features to work out the translation from virtual host to document root, from a separate configuration file. This provides more flexibility, but requires more complicated configuration.
trans-unit.target: 这种安排使用了更高级的 mod_rewrite 功能，可以从单独的配置文件计算出从虚拟主机到文档根目录的转换。这提供了更大的灵活性，但是需要更复杂的配置。

trans-unit.source: This article covers the "standard" way of protecting parts of your web site that most of you are going to use.
trans-unit.target: 这篇文章涵盖了大多数人都会使用的保护网站部分的 "标准 "方式。

trans-unit.source: This article deals with Server Side Includes, usually called simply SSI. In this article, I'll talk about configuring your server to permit SSI, and introduce some basic SSI techniques for adding dynamic content to your existing HTML pages.
trans-unit.target: 这篇文章涉及服务器端包含,通常被简单地称为SSI.在这篇文章中,我将谈论配置你的服务器以允许SSI,并介绍一些基本的SSI技术,以增加你现有的HTML页面的动态内容。在这篇文章中,我将讨论如何配置你的服务器以允许SSI,并介绍一些基本的SSI技术,以便在你现有的HTML页面中添加动态内容。

trans-unit.source: This at least avoids the extra checks for the DocumentRoot path. Note that you'll need to add similar sections if you have any Alias or RewriteRule paths outside of your document root. For highest performance, and no symlink protection, set FollowSymLinks everywhere, and never set SymLinksIfOwnerMatch.
trans-unit.target: 这至少避免了对 DocumentRoot 路径的额外检查。请注意，如果文档根目录之外有任何 Alias 或 RewriteRule 路径，则需要添加类似的部分。为了获得最高性能，并且没有符号链接保护， FollowSymLinks 在各处设置FollowSymLinks，并且永远不要设置 SymLinksIfOwnerMatch 。

trans-unit.source: This can be a dangerous thing to change. Make certain every path you include in this define is a trusted directory. You don't want to open people up to having someone from across the world running a trojan horse on them.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是一件危险的事情。确保您在此定义中包括的每个路径都是受信任的目录。您不想让人们放开世界各地的人在上面运行特洛伊木马。

trans-unit.source: This can be also used to force the handler based on some conditions. For example, the following snippet used in per-server context allows .php files to be displayed by mod_php if they are requested with the .phps extension:
trans-unit.target: 这也可以用于根据某些条件强制处理程序。例如，在每个服务器上下文中使用以下代码段，如果以 .phps 扩展名请求的话， .php 文件可以由 mod_php 显示：

trans-unit.source: This can be used to send any kind of data from the server, including redirects and other special HTTP responses, without requiring a cgi-script or an nph script.
trans-unit.target: 这可以用来从服务器发送任何类型的数据,包括重定向和其他特殊的HTTP响应,而不需要cgi脚本或nph脚本。

trans-unit.source: This can happen when you try to connect to a HTTPS server (or virtual server) via HTTP (eg, using http://example.com/ instead of https://example.com). It can also happen when trying to connect via HTTPS to a HTTP server (eg, using https://example.com/ on a server which doesn't support HTTPS, or which supports it on a non-standard port). Make sure that you're connecting to a (virtual) server that supports SSL.
trans-unit.target: 当您尝试通过HTTP（例如，使用 http://example.com/ 而不是 https://example.com ）连接到HTTPS服务器（或虚拟服务器）时，可能会发生这种情况。当尝试通过HTTPS连接到HTTP服务器时（例如，在不支持HTTPS或在非标准端口上支持HTTPS的服务器上使用 https://example.com/ )，也会发生这种情况。确保您要连接到支持SSL的（虚拟）服务器。

trans-unit.source: This can help provide privacy to user sessions where the contents of the session should be kept private from the user, or where protection is needed against the effects of cross site scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: 这可以帮助为用户会话提供隐私,在这种情况下,会话的内容应该对用户保密,或者需要防止跨站点脚本攻击的影响。

trans-unit.source: This cannot be a fully qualified URL, you are not allowed to pass the protocol or a server name (e.g. simply /location).
trans-unit.target: 这不能是完全限定的URL，不允许您传递协议或服务器名称（例如，简单地 /location ）。

trans-unit.source: This causes logresolve to apply some DNS checks: after finding the hostname from the IP address, it looks up the IP addresses for the hostname and checks that one of these matches the original address.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致 logresolve 应用一些DNS检查：从IP地址中找到主机名后，它将查找该主机名的IP地址并检查其中之一是否与原始地址匹配。

trans-unit.source: This causes any Vary fields to be removed from the response header before it is sent back to the client. Some clients don't interpret this field correctly; setting this variable can work around this problem. Setting this variable also implies force-response-1.0.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致在将任何 Vary 字段发送回客户端之前，将其从响应标头中删除。一些客户不能正确解释该字段。设置此变量可以解决此问题。设置此变量还意味着force-response-1.0。

trans-unit.source: This causes cacheable resources to be stored separately for each session, which is often not desired. CacheIgnoreURLSessionIdentifiers lets define a list of identifiers that are removed from the key that is used to identify an entity in the cache, such that cacheable resources are not stored separately for each session.
trans-unit.target: 这导致可缓存资源针对每个会话分别存储，这通常是不希望的。 CacheIgnoreURLSessionIdentifiers 允许定义一个标识符列表，该标识符从用于标识高速缓存中实体的键中删除，这样可高速缓存的资源就不会为每个会话单独存储。

trans-unit.source: This code is designed to always respect the process control directive of the MPMs, so the number of processes and threads available to serve clients will be maintained at the appropriate values throughout the restart process. Furthermore, it respects StartServers in the following manner: if after one second at least StartServers new children have not been created, then create enough to pick up the slack. Hence the code tries to maintain both the number of children appropriate for the current load on the server, and respect your wishes with the StartServers parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此代码旨在始终遵循MPM的流程控制指令，因此在重新启动过程中，可为客户使用的流程和线程数将保持在适当的值。此外，它以下列方式尊重 StartServers ：如果至少一秒钟之后仍未创建 StartServers ，则创建足够的新子级以吸收松弛。因此，代码将尝试维持适合当前服务器负载的子 StartServers ，并通过StartServers参数遵守您的意愿。

trans-unit.source: This command controls various aspects of the parsing. The valid attributes are:
trans-unit.target: 该命令控制解析的各个环节。有效的属性是:

trans-unit.source: This command doesn't output anything. Its only use is to add comments within a file. These comments are not printed.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令不输出任何东西。它的唯一用途是在文件中添加注释。这些注释不会被打印出来。

trans-unit.source: This command inserts the text of another document or file into the parsed file. Any included file is subject to the usual access control. If the directory containing the parsed file has OptionsIncludesNOEXEC set, then only documents with a text MIME-type (text/plain, text/html etc.) will be included. Otherwise CGI scripts are invoked as normal using the complete URL given in the command, including any query string.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将另一个文档或文件的文本插入已分析的文件。任何包含的文件都受通常的访问控制。如果包含已解析文件的目录设置了Options IncludesNOEXEC ，则仅包含文本MIME类型的文档（ text/plain ， text/html 等）。否则，将使用命令中给定的完整URL（包括任何查询字符串）正常调用CGI脚本。

trans-unit.source: This command prints one of the include variables defined below. If the variable is unset, the result is determined by the SSIUndefinedEcho directive. Any dates printed are subject to the currently configured timefmt.
trans-unit.target: 此命令显示以下定义的包含变量之一。如果未设置变量，则结果由 SSIUndefinedEcho 指令确定。打印的任何日期均受当前配置的 timefmt 的影响。

trans-unit.source: This command prints the last modification date of the specified file, subject to the timefmt format specification. The attributes are the same as for the fsize command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令根据 timefmt 格式说明打印指定文件的最后修改日期。这些属性与 fsize 命令的属性相同。

trans-unit.source: This command prints the size of the specified file, subject to the sizefmt format specification. Attributes:
trans-unit.target: 此命令根据 sizefmt 格式说明打印指定文件的大小。属性：

trans-unit.source: This command will dump out a description of how Apache parsed the configuration file. Careful examination of the IP addresses and server names may help uncover configuration mistakes. (See the docs for the httpd program for other command line options)
trans-unit.target: 此命令将转储有关Apache如何解析配置文件的描述。仔细检查IP地址和服务器名称可能有助于发现配置错误。（有关其他命令行选项，请参见 httpd 程序的文档）

trans-unit.source: This complex directive uses a colon-separated cipher-spec string consisting of OpenSSL cipher specifications to configure the Cipher Suite the client is permitted to negotiate in the SSL handshake phase. The optional protocol specifier can configure the Cipher Suite for a specific SSL version. Possible values include "SSL" for all SSL Protocols up to and including TLSv1.2.
trans-unit.target: 此复杂指令使用冒号分隔的，由OpenSSL密码规范组成的密码规范字符串来配置允许客户端在SSL握手阶段进行协商的Cipher Suite。可选的协议说明符可以为特定的SSL版本配置密码套件。可能的值包括所有SSL协议（包括TLSv1.2）及以下的“ SSL”。

trans-unit.source: This configuration can be changed into an IP-based virtual hosting solution by just turning UseCanonicalName Off into UseCanonicalName DNS. The server name that is inserted into the filename is then derived from the IP address of the virtual host. The variable %0 references the requested servername, as indicated in the Host: header.
trans-unit.target: 只需将 UseCanonicalName Off 为 UseCanonicalName DNS ，就可以将该配置更改为基于IP的虚拟主机解决方案。然后，从虚拟主机的IP地址派生到文件名中的服务器名称。变量 %0 引用请求的服务器名，如 Host: 头中所示。

trans-unit.source: This configuration will rotate the error logfile whenever it reaches a size of 5 megabytes, and the suffix to the logfile name will be created of the form errorlog.YYYY-mm-dd-HH_MM_SS.
trans-unit.target: 此配置将在大小达到5 MB时旋转错误日志文件，并且日志文件名称的后缀将以 errorlog.YYYY-mm-dd-HH_MM_SS 的形式创建。

trans-unit.source: This configuration will rotate the logfile whenever it reaches a size of 5 megabytes.
trans-unit.target: 每当日志文件的大小达到5兆字节时,这个配置就会旋转日志文件。

trans-unit.source: This configures an actual filter chain, from declared filters. FilterChain takes any number of arguments, each optionally preceded with a single-character control that determines what to do:
trans-unit.target: 这将从声明的过滤器配置实际的过滤器链。 FilterChain 接受任意数量的参数，每个参数可选地以一个单字符控件开头，该控件确定要执行的操作：

trans-unit.source: This configures one or more sources for seeding the Pseudo Random Number Generator (PRNG) in OpenSSL at startup time (context is startup) and/or just before a new SSL connection is established (context is connect). This directive can only be used in the global server context because the PRNG is a global facility.
trans-unit.target: 这将配置一个或多个源，以在启动时（上下文为 startup ）和/或在建立新的SSL连接之前（上下文为 connect ）在OpenSSL中植入伪随机数生成器（PRNG ）。由于PRNG是全局工具，因此只能在全局服务器上下文中使用此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: This configures the storage type of the global/inter-process SSL Session Cache. This cache is an optional facility which speeds up parallel request processing. For requests to the same server process (via HTTP keep-alive), OpenSSL already caches the SSL session information locally. But because modern clients request inlined images and other data via parallel requests (usually up to four parallel requests are common) those requests are served by different pre-forked server processes. Here an inter-process cache helps to avoid unnecessary session handshakes.
trans-unit.target: 这将配置全局/进程间SSL会话缓存的存储类型。该缓存是可选功能，可加快并行请求处理。对于对同一服务器进程的请求（通过HTTP保持活动），OpenSSL已在本地缓存SSL会话信息。但是，由于现代客户端通过并行请求（通常多达四个并行请求）请求内联图像和其他数据，因此这些请求由不同的预分支服务器进程处理。在此，进程间缓存有助于避免不必要的会话握手。

trans-unit.source: This controls the directory to which Apache httpd attempts to switch before dumping core. If your operating system is configured to create core files in the working directory of the crashing process, CoreDumpDirectory is necessary to change working directory from the default ServerRoot directory, which should not be writable by the user the server runs as.
trans-unit.target: 这可以控制Apache httpd在转储核心之前尝试切换到的目录。如果您的操作系统配置为在崩溃过程的工作目录中创建核心文件，则必须使用 CoreDumpDirectory 从默认的 ServerRoot 目录更改工作目录，服务器运行时所在的用户不能写该目录。

trans-unit.source: This controls whether or not Basic auth is required before passing the request to the authorizer. If required, the authorizer won't be invoked without a user id and password; 401 will be returned for a request without that.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了在将请求传递给授权者之前是否需要Basic auth。如果需要,那么在没有用户ID和密码的情况下,授权者将不会被调用;对于没有用户ID和密码的请求,将返回401。

trans-unit.source: This controls whether or not other modules are allowed to run when this module has a FastCGI authorizer configured and it fails the request.
trans-unit.target: 这控制了当本模块配置了FastCGI授权器,且请求失败时,是否允许其他模块运行。

trans-unit.source: This creates the file /var/log/logfile, truncating the file at startup and then truncating the file once per day. It is expected in this scenario that a separate process (such as tail) would process the file in real time.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建文件/var/log/logfile,在启动时截断该文件,然后每天截断一次。在这种情况下,预计会有一个单独的进程(如tail)实时处理该文件。

trans-unit.source: This creates the files /var/log/logfile.nnnn where nnnn is the system time at which the log nominally starts (this time will always be a multiple of the rotation time, so you can synchronize cron scripts with it). At the end of each rotation time (here after 24 hours) a new log is started.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建文件/var/log/logfile.nnnnn,其中nnnnn是系统时间,名义上是日志开始的时间(这个时间总是轮换时间的倍数,所以你可以用它来同步cron脚本)。在每个轮换时间结束时(这里是24小时后),会启动一个新的日志。

trans-unit.source: This creates the files /var/log/logfile.yyyy.mm.dd where yyyy is the year, mm is the month, and dd is the day of the month. Logging will switch to a new file every day at midnight, local time.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建文件/var/log/logfile.yyyy.mm.dd,其中yyyy是年,mm是月,dd是月的一天。日志将在当地时间每天午夜时分切换到新的文件。

trans-unit.source: This defines remote proxies to this proxy. match is either the name of a URL-scheme that the remote server supports, or a partial URL for which the remote server should be used, or * to indicate the server should be contacted for all requests. remote-server is a partial URL for the remote server. Syntax:
trans-unit.target: 这定义了此代理的远程代理。 match 是远程服务器支持的URL方案的名称，或者是应使用远程服务器的部分URL，或者 * 表示应为所有请求联系该服务器。 remote-server 是远程服务器的部分URL。句法：

trans-unit.source: This defines the nicknamecommon and associates it with a particular log format string. The format string consists of percent directives, each of which tell the server to log a particular piece of information. Literal characters may also be placed in the format string and will be copied directly into the log output. The quote character (") must be escaped by placing a backslash before it to prevent it from being interpreted as the end of the format string. The format string may also contain the special control characters "\n" for new-line and "\t" for tab.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了 common 昵称，并将其与特定的日志格式字符串关联。格式字符串由百分比指令组成，每个指令均指示服务器记录特定信息。文字字符也可以放在格式字符串中，并将直接复制到日志输出中。引号字符（ " ）必须通过在其前面加上反斜杠来转义，以防止其被解释为格式字符串的末尾。格式字符串还可能包含换行符和 \t 的特殊控制字符” \n “ t “（用于制表符）。

trans-unit.source: This defines the directory tree under which suexec access is allowed for executables. Default value is --datadir/htdocs.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了目录树，可执行文件允许在此目录下进行 suexec 访问。默认值为 --datadir/htdocs 。

trans-unit.source: This defines the filename of the suexec logfile. By default the logfile is named suexec_log and located in --logfiledir.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了 suexec 日志文件的文件名。默认情况下，该日志文件名为 suexec_log ，位于 --logfiledir 中。

trans-unit.source: This defines the filename to which all suEXEC transactions and errors are logged (useful for auditing and debugging purposes). By default the logfile is named "suexec_log" and located in your standard logfile directory (--logfiledir).
trans-unit.target: 这定义了所有suEXEC事务和错误记录到的文件名（用于审计和调试目的）。默认情况下，该日志文件名为“ suexec_log ”，位于标准日志文件目录（ --logfiledir ）中。

trans-unit.source: This defines the path to suexec binary. Default is --sbindir (see Fine tuning of installation directories).
trans-unit.target: 这定义了 suexec 二进制文件的路径。缺省值为 --sbindir （请参阅安装目录的微调）。

trans-unit.source: This defines the port on which httpd will listen. This port number is used when generating the configuration file httpd.conf. The default is 80.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了 httpd 侦听的端口。生成配置文件 httpd.conf 时使用此端口号。默认值为80。

trans-unit.source: This defines the subdirectory under the user's directory that contains all executables for which suexec access is allowed. This setting is necessary when you want to use suexec together with user-specific directories (as provided by mod_userdir). The default is public_html.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了用户目录下的子目录，该目录包含允许 suexec 访问的所有可执行文件。当您要将 suexec 与用户特定的目录（由 mod_userdir 提供）一起使用时，此设置是必需的。默认值为 public_html 。

trans-unit.source: This defines the user allowed to call suexec. It should be the same as the user under which httpd normally runs.
trans-unit.target: 这定义了允许调用 suexec 的用户。它应该与正常运行 httpd 的用户相同。

trans-unit.source: This difference between onsuccess and always is a feature that resulted as a consequence of how httpd internally stores headers for a HTTP response, since it does not offer any "normalized" single list of headers. The main problem that can arise if the following concept is not kept in mind while writing the configuration is that some HTTP responses might end up with the same header duplicated (confusing users or sometimes even HTTP clients). For example, suppose that you have a simple PHP proxy setup with mod_proxy_fcgi and your backend PHP scripts adds the X-Foo: bar header to each HTTP response. As described above, mod_proxy_fcgi uses the always table to store headers, so a configuration like the following ends up in the wrong result, namely having the header duplicated with both values:
trans-unit.target: onsuccess 与 always 之间的这种差异是由于httpd内部存储HTTP响应的标头而导致的，因为它不提供任何“标准化”标头列表。如果在编写配置时不牢记以下概念，可能会出现的主要问题是，某些HTTP响应可能最终会重复相同的标头（使用户困惑，有时甚至是HTTP客户端）。例如，假设您使用 mod_proxy_fcgi 进行了简单的PHP代理设置，并且后端PHP脚本将 X-Foo: bar 标头添加到每个HTTP响应中。如上所述， mod_proxy_fcgi 使用 always 表格来存储标头，因此如下所示的配置最终会导致错误的结果，即使标头重复使用两个值：

trans-unit.source: This directive should always be specified and contain at least the (set of) root URI(s) for this space. Omitting to do so will cause the client to send the Authorization header for every request sent to this server.
trans-unit.target: 应该始终指定此伪指令，并且至少包含此空间的（一组）根URI。忽略此操作将导致客户端为发送到此服务器的每个请求发送授权标头。

trans-unit.source: This directive activates a particular output filter for a request depending on the response media-type.
trans-unit.target: 该指令根据响应media-type激活请求的特定输出过滤器。

trans-unit.source: This directive adds a member to a load balancing group. It can be used within a <Proxy balancer://...> container directive and can take any of the key value pair parameters available to ProxyPass directives.
trans-unit.target: 该指令将成员添加到负载平衡组。它可以在 <Proxy balancer://...> 容器指令中使用，并且可以采用 ProxyPass 指令可用的任何键值对参数。

trans-unit.source: This directive adds an action, which will activate cgi-script when action-type is triggered by the request. The cgi-script is the URL-path to a resource that has been designated as a CGI script using ScriptAlias or AddHandler. The action-type can be either a handler or a MIME content type. It sends the URL and file path of the requested document using the standard CGI PATH_INFO and PATH_TRANSLATED environment variables. The handler used for the particular request is passed using the REDIRECT_HANDLER variable.
trans-unit.target: 该指令添加了一个动作，当 action-type 被请求触发时，它将激活 cgi-script 。该 cgi-script 是URL的路径，已被指定为使用CGI脚本资源 ScriptAlias 或 AddHandler 的。的 action-type 可以是一个处理器或一个MIME内容类型。它使用标准CGI PATH_INFO 和 PATH_TRANSLATED 环境变量发送所请求文档的URL和文件路径。使用 REDIRECT_HANDLER 变量传递用于特定请求的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This directive adds an action, which will activate cgi-script when a file is requested using the method of method. The cgi-script is the URL-path to a resource that has been designated as a CGI script using ScriptAlias or AddHandler. The URL and file path of the requested document is sent using the standard CGI PATH_INFO and PATH_TRANSLATED environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 该指令添加了一个动作，当使用method method 请求文件时，该动作将激活 cgi-script 。该 cgi-script 是URL的路径，已被指定为使用CGI脚本资源 ScriptAlias 或 AddHandler 的。使用标准CGI PATH_INFO 和 PATH_TRANSLATED 环境变量发送所请求文档的URL和文件路径。

trans-unit.source: This directive adds some default behavior to ANY regular expression used afterwards.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令为之后使用的任何正则表达式添加了一些默认行为。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows a user to specifiy a timeout on proxy requests. This is useful when you have a slow/buggy appserver which hangs, and you would rather just return a timeout and fail gracefully instead of waiting however long it takes the server to return.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令允许用户指定代理请求的超时时间。当你有一个慢的/有问题的appserver挂起时,这很有用,你宁愿只返回一个超时并优雅地失败,而不是等待服务器返回所需的时间。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows access to the server to be restricted based on hostname, IP address, or environment variables. The arguments for the Deny directive are identical to the arguments for the Allow directive.
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许根据主机名，IP地址或环境变量来限制对服务器的访问。对于这些参数 Deny 指令是相同的论据， Allow 指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows for growth potential in the number of Balancers available for a virtualhost in addition to the number pre-configured. It only takes effect if there is at least one pre-configured Balancer.
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许在预配置的数量之外,增加虚拟主机的平衡器数量。只有当至少有一个预配置的平衡器时,它才会生效。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows inclusion of other configuration files from within the server configuration files.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令允许从服务器配置文件中包含其他配置文件。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows inclusion of other configuration files from within the server configuration files. It works identically to the Include directive, but it will be silently ignored (instead of causing an error) if wildcards are used and they do not match any file or directory or if a file path does not exist on the file system.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令允许从服务器配置文件中包含其他配置文件。它的工作原理与 Include 指令相同，但是如果使用通配符且它们与任何文件或目录都不匹配，或者文件系统上不存在文件路径，它将被忽略（而不是引起错误）。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows remote servers to be mapped into the space of the local server. The local server does not act as a proxy in the conventional sense but appears to be a mirror of the remote server. The local server is often called a
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许远程服务器被映射到本地服务器的空间中。本地服务器并不是传统意义上的代理,而是看起来是远程服务器的镜像。本地服务器通常被称为

trans-unit.source: This directive allows the environment variables above, or any others of interest, to be overridden. This directive is evaluated after the initial values for these variables are set, so they can be used as input into both the condition expressions and value expressions.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令允许覆盖上面的环境变量或任何其他感兴趣的变量。这条指令在这些变量的初始值被设置后被评估,因此它们可以作为条件表达式和值表达式的输入。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows the type of backend FastCGI application to be specified. Some FastCGI servers, such as PHP-FPM, use historical quirks of environment variables to identify the type of proxy server being used. Set this directive to "GENERIC" if your non PHP-FPM application has trouble interpreting environment variables such as SCRIPT_FILENAME or PATH_TRANSLATED as set by the server.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令允许指定后端FastCGI应用的类型。一些FastCGI服务器,如PHP-FPM,使用环境变量的历史怪癖来识别正在使用的代理服务器的类型。如果您的非 PHP-FPM 应用程序在解释环境变量(如服务器设置的 SCRIPT_FILENAME 或 PATH_TRANSLATED)时有问题,请将此指令设置为 "GENERIC"。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows to enable compression on the SSL level.
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许在SSL级别上启用压缩。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows to enable or disable the use of TLS session tickets (RFC 5077).
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许启用或禁用TLS会话票据的使用(RFC 5077)。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows to set a specific local address to bind to when connecting to a backend server.
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许设置一个特定的本地地址,以便在连接到后台服务器时进行绑定。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows you to change the name of the cookie this module uses for its tracking purposes. By default the cookie is named "Apache".
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许您更改此模块用于其跟踪目的的cookie的名称。默认情况下，cookie名为“ Apache ”。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows you to define a Managed Domain (MD) with specific settings, different from the global MD* ones. For example, you can have such an MD use another CA then Let's Encrypt, have its unique renewal duration etc.
trans-unit.target: 这个指令允许你定义一个托管域(MD),有特定的设置,不同于全局MD*的设置。例如,您可以让这样的MD使用另一个CA,然后再使用Let's Encrypt,有其独特的更新期限等。

trans-unit.source: This directive allows you to override the prefix used for environment variables set during LDAP authorization. If AUTHENTICATE_ is specified, consumers of these environment variables see the same information whether LDAP has performed authentication, authorization, or both.
trans-unit.target: 该指令允许您覆盖在LDAP授权期间用于环境变量设置的前缀。如果指定了AUTHENTICATE_，则这些环境变量的使用者将看到相同的信息，而LDAP是否执行了身份验证，授权或同时执行了两者。

trans-unit.source: This directive applies to requests for directories that may or may not end in a trailing slash, so expressions that are anchored to the end of line ($) must be written with care.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令适用于对目录的请求,这些目录可能以尾部的斜线结束,也可能不以尾部的斜线结束,因此,锚定在行末($)的表达式必须小心书写。

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used instead of the compile-time setting SECURITY_HOLE_PASS_AUTHORIZATION which has been available in previous versions of Apache HTTP Server.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此伪指令代替Apache HTTP Server早期版本中提供的编译时设置 SECURITY_HOLE_PASS_AUTHORIZATION 。

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used to control the SSL protocol flavors mod_ssl should use when establishing its server environment for proxy . It will only connect to servers using one of the provided protocols.
trans-unit.target: 这个指令可以用来控制mod_ssl在为proxy建立服务器环境时应该使用的SSL协议flavors。它将只连接到使用所提供的协议之一的服务器。

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used to control various run-time options on a per-directory basis. Normally, if multiple SSLOptions could apply to a directory, then the most specific one is taken completely; the options are not merged. However if all the options on the SSLOptions directive are preceded by a plus (+) or minus (-) symbol, the options are merged. Any options preceded by a + are added to the options currently in force, and any options preceded by a - are removed from the options currently in force.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令可用于控制每个目录的各种运行时选项。通常，如果多个 SSLOptions 可以应用于一个目录，则最具体的一个将被完全采用；选项不会合并。但是，如果 SSLOptions 指令上的所有选项都以加号（ + ）或减号（ - ）开头，则这些选项将合并。前面带有 + 的所有选项都添加到当前有效的选项中，而前面带有 - 的所有选项将从当前有效的选项中删除。

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used to control which versions of the SSL/TLS protocol will be accepted in new connections.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令可以用来控制新的连接将接受哪些版本的SSL/TLS协议。

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used to fine-tune the per-process connection limit. A process will only accept new connections if the current number of connections (not counting connections in the "closing" state) is lower than:
trans-unit.target: 该指令可用于微调每个进程的连接限制。甲过程将只接受新的连接，如果连接（未计数的“闭合”状态的连接）的当前数目低于：

trans-unit.source: This directive can be used to toggle the use of <IfDefine> sections without needing to alter -D arguments in any startup scripts.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令可用于切换 <IfDefine> 节的使用，而无需更改任何启动脚本中的 -D 参数。

trans-unit.source: This directive can only be used if this module authenticates the user, and has no effect when this module is used exclusively for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 该指令只能在该模块对用户进行认证时使用,当该模块专门用于授权时,该指令没有效果。

trans-unit.source: This directive can open huge security holes in apache subprocesses, up to and including running them with root-level powers. Do not use it unless you fully understand what you are doing!
trans-unit.target: 这条指令会在apache子进程中打开巨大的安全漏洞,甚至包括用root级别的权限运行子进程。除非你完全明白你在做什么,否则不要使用它。

trans-unit.source: This directive can open huge security holes in apache, up to and including running requests with root-level powers. Do not use it unless you fully understand what you are doing!
trans-unit.target: 这条指令会在apache中打开巨大的安全漏洞,甚至包括用root级别的权限运行请求。除非你完全明白你在做什么,否则不要使用它!

trans-unit.source: This directive can replace, merge or remove HTTP response headers. The header is modified just after the content handler and output filters are run, allowing outgoing headers to be modified.
trans-unit.target: 这个指令可以替换、合并或删除HTTP响应头。在内容处理程序和输出过滤器运行后,就会对头进行修改,允许修改出站头。

trans-unit.source: This directive can replace, merge, change or remove HTTP request headers. The header is modified just before the content handler is run, allowing incoming headers to be modified. The action it performs is determined by the first argument. This can be one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 该指令可以替换、合并、更改或删除HTTP请求头。在内容处理程序运行之前就会修改头,允许修改传入的头。它所执行的操作由第一个参数决定。它可以是以下值之一。

trans-unit.source: This directive can set various timeouts for receiving the request headers and the request body from the client. If the client fails to send headers or body within the configured time, a 408 REQUEST TIME OUT error is sent.
trans-unit.target: 该指令可以设置各种超时，以从客户端接收请求标头和请求正文。如果客户端未能在配置的时间内发送标头或正文，则会发送 408 REQUEST TIME OUT 错误。

trans-unit.source: This directive cannot be used to run apache as root! Nevertheless, it opens potential security issues similar to those discussed in the suexec documentation.
trans-unit.target: 该指令不能以root身份运行apache！但是，它带来了类似于suexec文档中讨论的潜在安全问题。

trans-unit.source: This directive causes a user defined message to be logged to the error log. The message can use variables and functions from the ap_expr syntax. References to HTTP headers will not cause header names to be added to the Vary header. The messages are logged at loglevel info.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令导致将用户定义的消息记录到错误日志中。该消息可以使用ap_expr语法中的变量和函数。引用HTTP标头不会导致将标头名称添加到Vary标头中。消息记录在日志级别信息中。

trans-unit.source: This directive changes the format in which date strings are displayed when echoing DATE environment variables. The formatstring is as in strftime(3) from the C standard library.
trans-unit.target: 该指令更改在回显 DATE 环境变量时日期字符串显示的格式。该 formatstring 是如 strftime(3) 从C标准库。

trans-unit.source: This directive changes the rules applied to the HTTP Request Line (RFC 7230 §3.1.1) and the HTTP Request Header Fields (RFC 7230 §3.2), which are now applied by default or using the Strict option. Due to legacy modules, applications or custom user-agents which must be deprecated the Unsafe option has been added to revert to the legacy behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 该指令更改了应用于HTTP请求行（RFC 7230§3.1.1）和HTTP请求标头字段（RFC 7230§3.2）的规则，这些规则现在默认情况下或使用 Strict 选项应用。由于遗留模块，必须弃用的应用程序或自定义用户代理，已添加了“ Unsafe 选项以还原为遗留行为。

trans-unit.source: This directive changes the string that mod_include displays when a variable is not set and "echoed".
trans-unit.target: 当未设置变量并“回显”变量时，此伪指令更改 mod_include 显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This directive changes the string that mod_include looks for to mark an include element to process.
trans-unit.target: 该指令更改了 mod_include 寻找的字符串以标记要处理的include元素。

trans-unit.source: This directive changes the string that mod_include looks for to mark the end of an include element.
trans-unit.target: 该指令更改了 mod_include 寻找以标记include元素结尾的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This directive configures host name checking for server certificates when mod_ssl is acting as an SSL client. The check will succeed if the host name from the request URI matches one of the CN attribute(s) of the certificate's subject, or matches the subjectAltName extension. If the check fails, the SSL request is aborted and a 502 status code (Bad Gateway) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当mod_ssl作为SSL客户端时,这条指令用于配置服务器证书的主机名检查。如果请求URI中的主机名与证书主体的CN属性之一相匹配,或者与subjectAltName扩展名相匹配,则检查成功。如果检查失败,SSL请求将被中止,并返回一个502状态码(坏网关)。

trans-unit.source: This directive configures the LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT (or LDAP_OPT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT) option in the underlying LDAP client library, when available. This value typically controls how long the LDAP client library will wait for the TCP connection to the LDAP server to complete.
trans-unit.target: 该指令配置底层LDAP客户端库中的LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT(或LDAP_OPT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT)选项(如果可用)。这个值通常控制LDAP客户端库等待与LDAP服务器的TCP连接完成的时间。

trans-unit.source: This directive configures the timeout for bind and search operations, as well as the LDAP_OPT_TIMEOUT option in the underlying LDAP client library, when available.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令配置绑定和搜索操作的超时,以及底层LDAP客户端库中的LDAP_OPT_TIMEOUT选项(如果可用)。

trans-unit.source: This directive configures whether this module tracks the delay between the request being read and the first byte of the response headers being written. The resulting value may be logged with the %^FB format.
trans-unit.target: 该指令配置此模块是否跟踪读取请求和写入响应标头的第一个字节之间的延迟。结果值可以用 %^FB 格式记录。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls how some CGI variables are set.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令控制一些CGI变量的设置方式。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls the format of the cookie header field. The three formats allowed are:
trans-unit.target: 这条指令控制cookie头的格式。允许的三种格式是:

trans-unit.source: This directive controls the reflection of request headers to the response. The first argument is the name of the request header to copy. If the optional second argument is specified, it will be used as the name of the response header, otherwise the original request header name will be used.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令控制将请求头反映到响应中。第一个参数是要复制的请求头的名称,如果指定了可选的第二个参数,它将作为响应头的名称,否则将使用原始的请求头名称。如果指定了可选的第二个参数,它将被用作响应头的名称,否则将使用原始请求头的名称。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls the setting of the domain to which the tracking cookie applies. If not present, no domain is included in the cookie header field.
trans-unit.target: 该指令控制跟踪cookie所适用的域的设置。如果不存在,cookie头域中不包含任何域。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls the use of the Via: HTTP header by the proxy. Its intended use is to control the flow of proxy requests along a chain of proxy servers. See RFC 2616 (HTTP/1.1), section 14.45 for an explanation of Via: header lines.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令控制代理对 Via: HTTP标头的使用。它的预期用途是控制沿着代理服务器链的代理请求的流。有关 Via: 标头行的说明，请参阅RFC 2616（HTTP / 1.1）第14.45节。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls the use of the Via: HTTP header by the proxy. Its intended use is to control the flow of proxy requests along a chain of proxy servers. See RFC 2616 (HTTP/1.1), section 14.45 for an explanation of Via: header lines.

This directive controls whether httpd may use the sendfile support from the kernel to transmit file contents to the client. By default, when the handling of a request requires no access to the data within a file -- for example, when delivering a static file -- Apache httpd uses sendfile to deliver the file contents without ever reading the file if the OS supports it.
trans-unit.target: 该指令控制 httpd 是否可以使用内核的sendfile支持来将文件内容传输到客户端。默认情况下，当请求的处理不需要访问文件中的数据时（例如，传递静态文件时），如果操作系统支持，Apache httpd使用sendfile传递文件内容而无需读取文件。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls whether Server response header field which is sent back to clients includes a description of the generic OS-type of the server as well as information about compiled-in modules.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令控制发送回客户端的 Server 响应标头字段是否包括对服务器的通用OS类型的描述以及有关嵌入式模块的信息。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls whether HTTP trailers are copied into the internal representation of HTTP headers. This merging occurs when the request body has been completely consumed, long after most header processing would have a chance to examine or modify request headers.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令控制HTTP跟踪器是否被复制到HTTP头的内部表示中。这种合并发生在请求体被完全消耗之后,在大多数头处理有机会检查或修改请求头之后很久。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls whether requests that contain trailing pathname information that follows an actual filename (or non-existent file in an existing directory) will be accepted or rejected. The trailing pathname information can be made available to scripts in the PATH_INFO environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 该指令控制是否接受包含跟随实际文件名（或现有目录中不存在的文件）的尾随路径名信息的请求。尾随路径名信息可用于 PATH_INFO 环境变量中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls whether the httpd may use memory-mapping if it needs to read the contents of a file during delivery. By default, when the handling of a request requires access to the data within a file -- for example, when delivering a server-parsed file using mod_include -- Apache httpd memory-maps the file if the OS supports it.
trans-unit.target: 如果 httpd 需要在传递过程中读取文件的内容，则该指令控制httpd是否可以使用内存映射。默认情况下，当处理请求需要访问文件中的数据时（例如，使用 mod_include 交付服务器解析的文件时），如果操作系统支持，Apache httpd内存将映射该文件。

trans-unit.source: This directive controls whether the server will ensure that the REDIRECT_URL environment variable is fully qualified. By default, the variable contains the verbatim URL requested by the client, such as "/index.html". With QualifyRedirectURL ON, the same request would result in a value such as "http://www.example.com/index.html".
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令控制服务器是否将确保REDIRECT_URL环境变量完全合格。默认情况下，该变量包含客户端请求的逐字网址，例如“ /index.html”。将 QualifyRedirectURL ON ，相同的请求将导致诸如“ http://www.example.com/index.html”的值。

trans-unit.source: This directive currently has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 该指令目前没有效力。

trans-unit.source: This directive currently only works with the prefork MPM.
trans-unit.target: 该指令当前仅适用于 prefork MPM。

trans-unit.source: This directive declares an output filter together with a header or environment variable that will determine runtime configuration. The first argument is a filter-name for use in FilterProvider, FilterChain and FilterProtocol directives.
trans-unit.target: 该指令声明输出过滤器以及将确定运行时配置的标头或环境变量。第一个参数是在 FilterProvider ， FilterChain 和 FilterProtocol 指令中使用的 filter-name 。

trans-unit.source: This directive defines the priority handling of pushed responses based on the content-type of the response. This is usually defined per server config, but may also appear in a virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 该指令根据响应的内容类型定义了推送响应的优先处理。这通常是根据服务器配置定义的,但也可能出现在虚拟主机中。

trans-unit.source: This directive defines the value of the Expires header and the max-age directive of the Cache-Control header generated for documents of the specified type (e.g., text/html). The second argument sets the number of seconds that will be added to a base time to construct the expiration date. The Cache-Control: max-age is calculated by subtracting the request time from the expiration date and expressing the result in seconds.
trans-unit.target: 此指令定义值的 Expires 报头和 max-age 的指令的 Cache-Control 为指定的类型（文件生成的报头例如， text/html ）。第二个参数设置将添加到基准时间以构造到期日期的秒数。所述 Cache-Control: max-age 是通过从有效期限减去请求时间和表达的结果以秒计算的。

trans-unit.source: This directive determines whether or not proxy loadbalancer status data is displayed via the mod_status server-status page.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令确定是否通过 mod_status 服务器状态页面显示代理负载均衡器状态数据。

trans-unit.source: This directive determines whether or not proxy related information should be passed to the backend server through X-Forwarded-For, X-Forwarded-Host and X-Forwarded-Server HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: 该指令决定了是否应该通过X-Forwarded-Foror、X-Forwarded-Host和X-Forwarded-Server的HTTP头信息传递给后端服务器。

trans-unit.source: This directive differs slightly between a <Directory> context (including equivalents such as Location/Files/If) and a top-level or <VirtualHost>.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令在 <Directory> 上下文（包括诸如Location / Files / If之类的等同内容）与顶级或 <VirtualHost> 之间略有不同。

trans-unit.source: This directive does not affect the processing of informational (1xx), normal success (2xx), or redirect (3xx) responses.
trans-unit.target: 该指令不影响信息性(1xx)、正常成功(2xx)或重定向(3xx)响应的处理。

trans-unit.source: This directive does not currently work in configuration sections that have regular expression arguments, such as <DirectoryMatch>
trans-unit.target: 该指令当前不适用于具有正则表达式参数的配置节，例如 <DirectoryMatch>

trans-unit.source: This directive enables RFC 1413-compliant logging of the remote user name for each connection, where the client machine runs identd or something similar. This information is logged in the access log using the %...lformat string.
trans-unit.target: 该指令为客户端计算机以identd或类似身份运行的每个连接启用RFC 1413兼容的远程用户名日志记录。此信息使用 %...l 格式字符串记录在访问日志中。

trans-unit.source: This directive enables RFC 1413-compliant logging of the remote user name for each connection, where the client machine runs identd or something similar. This information is logged in the access log using the %...lformat string.

This directive enables DNS lookups so that host names can be logged (and passed to CGIs/SSIs in REMOTE_HOST). The value Double refers to doing double-reverse DNS lookup. That is, after a reverse lookup is performed, a forward lookup is then performed on that result. At least one of the IP addresses in the forward lookup must match the original address. (In "tcpwrappers" terminology this is called PARANOID.)
trans-unit.target: 该指令启用DNS查找，以便可以记录主机名（并在 REMOTE_HOST 中传递给CGI / SSI ）。值 Double 表示进行双反向DNS查找。即，在执行反向查找之后，然后对该结果执行正向查找。前向查找中的至少一个IP地址必须与原始地址匹配。（在“ tcpwrappers”术语中，这称为 PARANOID 。）

trans-unit.source: This directive enables TLS-SRP and sets the path to the OpenSSL SRP (Secure Remote Password) verifier file containing TLS-SRP usernames, verifiers, salts, and group parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令启用了TLS-SRP,并设置了OpenSSL SRP(安全远程密码)校验器文件的路径,该文件包含TLS-SRP用户名、校验器、盐分和组参数。

trans-unit.source: This directive enables operating system specific optimizations for a listening socket by the Protocol type. The basic premise is for the kernel to not send a socket to the server process until either data is received or an entire HTTP Request is buffered. Only FreeBSD's Accept Filters, Linux's more primitive TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT, and Windows' optimized AcceptEx() are currently supported.
trans-unit.target: 该指令通过 Protocol 类型为侦听套接字启用特定于操作系统的优化。基本前提是内核在接收到数据或缓冲整个HTTP请求之前，不向服务器进程发送套接字。目前仅支持FreeBSD的Accept Filters，Linux更为原始的 TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT 和Windows的优化AcceptEx（）。

trans-unit.source: This directive enables operating system specific optimizations for a listening socket by the Protocol type. The basic premise is for the kernel to not send a socket to the server process until either data is received or an entire HTTP Request is buffered. Only FreeBSD's Accept Filters, Linux's more primitive TCP_DEFER_ACCEPT, and Windows' optimized AcceptEx() are currently supported.

This directive enables or disables the generation of the Expires and Cache-Control headers for the document realm in question. (That is, if found in an .htaccess file, for instance, it applies only to documents generated from that directory.) If set to Off, the headers will not be generated for any document in the realm (unless overridden at a lower level, such as an .htaccess file overriding a server config file). If set to On, the headers will be added to served documents according to the criteria defined by the ExpiresByType and ExpiresDefault directives (q.v.).
trans-unit.target: 该指令启用或禁用有关文档领域的 Expires 和 Cache-Control 标头的生成。 （也就是说，例如，如果在 .htaccess 文件中找到，则仅适用于从该目录生成的文档。）如果设置为 Off ，则不会为领域中的任何文档生成标头（除非在较低级别被覆盖） ，例如覆盖服务器配置文件的 .htaccess 文件）。如果设置为 On ，则将根据 ExpiresByType 和 ExpiresDefault 指令（qv）定义的条件将标头添加到提供的文档中。

trans-unit.source: This directive enables or disables the spelling module. When enabled, keep in mind that
trans-unit.target: 这个指令可以启用或禁用拼写模块。启用时,请注意

trans-unit.source: This directive enables the generation of Content-MD5 headers as defined in RFC1864 respectively RFC2616.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令可以生成分别在RFC1864和RFC2616中定义的 Content-MD5 标头。

trans-unit.source: This directive enables use of a cryptographic hardware accelerator board to offload some of the SSL processing overhead. This directive can only be used if the SSL toolkit is built with "engine" support; OpenSSL 0.9.7 and later releases have "engine" support by default, the separate "-engine" releases of OpenSSL 0.9.6 must be used.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令允许使用加密硬件加速板来卸载SSL的一些处理开销。这个指令只能在SSL工具包是以 "引擎 "支持的方式构建的情况下使用;OpenSSL 0.9.7及以后的版本默认有 "引擎 "支持,必须使用OpenSSL 0.9.6的单独"-engine "版本。

trans-unit.source: This directive exposes OpenSSL's SSL_CONF API to mod_ssl, allowing a flexible configuration of OpenSSL parameters without the need of implementing additional mod_ssl directives when new features are added to OpenSSL.
trans-unit.target: 该指令将OpenSSL的SSL_CONF API 公开给mod_ssl，从而在向OpenSSL添加新功能时无需配置其他 mod_ssl 指令即可灵活配置OpenSSL参数。

trans-unit.source: This directive forbids access unless HTTP over SSL (i.e. HTTPS) is enabled for the current connection. This is very handy inside the SSL-enabled virtual host or directories for defending against configuration errors that expose stuff that should be protected. When this directive is present all requests are denied which are not using SSL.
trans-unit.target: 该指令禁止访问,除非当前连接启用了HTTP over SSL(即HTTPS)。这在启用了SSL的虚拟主机或目录中是非常方便的,可以防止配置错误,暴露出应该被保护的东西。当这个指令存在时,所有不使用SSL的请求都会被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: This directive generates debug information from mod_filter. It is designed to help test and debug providers (filter modules), although it may also help with mod_filter itself.
trans-unit.target: 该指令从 mod_filter 生成调试信息。尽管它也可能对 mod_filter 本身有所帮助，但它旨在帮助测试和调试提供程序（过滤器模块）。

trans-unit.source: This directive gives the server administrator greater control over abnormal client request behavior, which may be useful for avoiding some forms of denial-of-service attacks.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令让服务器管理员对异常的客户端请求行为有更大的控制权,这对于避免某些形式的拒绝服务攻击可能是有用的。

trans-unit.source: This directive gives the server administrator greater control over abnormal client request behavior, which may be useful for avoiding some forms of denial-of-service attacks. The value should be increased if normal clients see an error response from the server that indicates too many fields were sent in the request.
trans-unit.target: 该指令使服务器管理员对异常的客户端请求行为有更大的控制权,这对于避免某些形式的拒绝服务攻击可能是有用的。如果正常客户端看到服务器的错误响应表明请求中发送了太多的字段,则应增加该值。

trans-unit.source: This directive has a similar purpose to the <var>path</var> attribute in HTTP cookies, but should not be confused with this attribute. This directive does not set the <var>path</var> attribute, which must be configured separately.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令与HTTP cookie中的 <var>path</var> 属性具有相似的用途，但请勿与该属性混淆。此伪指令未设置 <var>path</var> 属性，该属性必须单独配置。

trans-unit.source: This directive has been disabled. For backwards compatibility of configuration files, it may be specified with the value none, meaning no default media type. For example:
trans-unit.target: 该指令已被禁用。为了向后兼容配置文件，可以将其指定为值 none ，表示没有默认媒体类型。例如：

trans-unit.source: This directive has exactly the same arguments and effect as the CustomLog directive, with the exception that it does not allow the log format to be specified explicitly or for conditional logging of requests. Instead, the log format is determined by the most recently specified LogFormat directive which does not define a nickname. Common Log Format is used if no other format has been specified.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令具有与 CustomLog 伪指令完全相同的参数和作用，不同之处在于它不允许显式指定日志格式或不允许有条件地记录请求。而是，日志格式由最近指定的 LogFormat 指令确定，该指令未定义昵称。如果未指定其他格式，则使用“通用日志格式”。

trans-unit.source: This directive has no affect on authorization, even for modules that provide both authentication and authorization.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令对授权没有影响,即使是对同时提供认证和授权的模块也是如此。

trans-unit.source: This directive has no effect other than to emit warnings if the value is not none. In prior versions, DefaultType would specify a default media type to assign to response content for which no other media type configuration could be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值不为 none ,则此指令除了发出警告外没有其他作用。在以前的版本中，DefaultType将指定默认媒体类型以分配给无法找到其他媒体类型配置的响应内容。

trans-unit.source: This directive has the same effect as the <!--#config errmsg=message --> element.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令与 <!--#config errmsg=message --> 元素具有相同的作用。

trans-unit.source: This directive has the same effect as the <!--#config timefmt=formatstring --> element.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令与 <!--#config timefmt=formatstring --> 元素具有相同的作用。

trans-unit.source: This directive influences how file content is handled in responses. When off, which is the default, file handles are passed from the requestion processing down to the main connection, using the usual Apache setaside handling for managing the lifetime of the file.
trans-unit.target: 该指令影响响应中文件内容的处理方式。当 off ，这是缺省值，文件句柄从再审处理下降到主连接通过，使用通常的Apache setaside处理用于管理文件的寿命。

trans-unit.source: This directive influences the calculation of the MinSpareThreads and MaxSpareThreads lower bound values. The number of children processes needs to be a multiple of the number of buckets to optimally accept connections.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令影响 MinSpareThreads 和 MaxSpareThreads 下限值的计算。子进程的数量必须是存储桶数量的倍数，才能最佳地接受连接。

trans-unit.source: This directive is required when you use a relative path in a substitution in per-directory (htaccess) context unless any of the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 在每个目录（htaccess）上下文中的替换中使用相对路径时，除非满足以下任一条件，否则此指令是必需的：

trans-unit.source: This directive is equivalent to Alias, but makes use of regular expressions, instead of simple prefix matching. The supplied regular expression is matched against the URL-path, and if it matches, the server will substitute any parenthesized matches into the given string and use it as a filename. For example, to activate the /icons directory, one might use:
trans-unit.target: 该指令等效于 Alias ，但使用正则表达式，而不是简单的前缀匹配。提供的正则表达式与URL路径匹配，如果匹配，则服务器会将所有带括号的匹配替换为给定的字符串，并将其用作文件名。例如，要激活 /icons 目录，可以使用：

trans-unit.source: This directive is equivalent to ProxyPass but makes use of regular expressions instead of simple prefix matching. The supplied regular expression is matched against the url, and if it matches, the server will substitute any parenthesized matches into the given string and use it as a new url.
trans-unit.target: 该指令等效于 ProxyPass ,但是使用正则表达式而不是简单的前缀匹配。提供的正则表达式与 url 匹配，如果匹配，则服务器会将所有带括号的匹配替换为给定的字符串，并将其用作新的 url 。

trans-unit.source: This directive is equivalent to Redirect, but makes use of regular expressions, instead of simple prefix matching. The supplied regular expression is matched against the URL-path, and if it matches, the server will substitute any parenthesized matches into the given string and use it as a filename. For example, to redirect all GIF files to like-named JPEG files on another server, one might use:
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令等效于 Redirect ，但是使用了正则表达式，而不是简单的前缀匹配。提供的正则表达式与URL路径匹配，如果匹配，则服务器会将所有带括号的匹配替换为给定的字符串，并将其用作文件名。例如，要将所有GIF文件重定向到另一台服务器上的同名JPEG文件，则可以使用：

trans-unit.source: This directive is equivalent to ScriptAlias, but makes use of regular expressions, instead of simple prefix matching. The supplied regular expression is matched against the URL-path, and if it matches, the server will substitute any parenthesized matches into the given string and use it as a filename. For example, to activate the standard /cgi-bin, one might use:
trans-unit.target: 该指令等效于 ScriptAlias ，但是使用了正则表达式，而不是简单的前缀匹配。提供的正则表达式与URL路径匹配，如果匹配，则服务器会将所有带括号的匹配替换为给定的字符串，并将其用作文件名。例如，要激活标准的 /cgi-bin ，可以使用：

trans-unit.source: This directive is not normally necessary: it is implied if authentication cacheing is enabled anywhere in <var>httpd.conf</var>. However, if it is not enabled anywhere in <var>httpd.conf</var> it will by default not be initialised, and is therefore not available in a <var>.htaccess</var> context. This directive ensures it is initialised so it can be used in <var>.htaccess</var>.
trans-unit.target: 该指令通常不是必需的：如果在 <var>httpd.conf</var> 中的任何位置启用了身份验证缓存，则意味着该指令。但是，如果未在 <var>httpd.conf</var> 中的任何位置启用它，则默认情况下将不对其进行初始化，因此在 <var>.htaccess</var> 上下文中不可用。该指令确保将其初始化，以便可以在 <var>.htaccess</var> 中使用。

trans-unit.source: This directive is not supported in <Directory> or <Files> sections.
trans-unit.target: <Directory> 或 <Files> 部分不支持此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive is not supported within <Directory>, <If> and <Files> containers.
trans-unit.target: <Directory> ， <If> 和 <Files> 容器不支持此指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive is not valid in <Directory>, <Files>, or htaccess context.
trans-unit.target: 该指令在 <Directory> ， <Files> 或htaccess上下文中无效。

trans-unit.source: This directive is only useful for Apache httpd proxy servers within intranets. The NoProxy directive specifies a list of subnets, IP addresses, hosts and/or domains, separated by spaces. A request to a host which matches one or more of these is always served directly, without forwarding to the configured ProxyRemote proxy server(s).
trans-unit.target: 该指令仅对内部网中的Apache httpd代理服务器有用。所述 NoProxy 指令指定的子网，IP地址，主机和/或域的列表，用空格隔开。与主机中的一个或多个主机匹配的请求始终直接得到 ProxyRemote ，而不会转发到已配置的ProxyRemote代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: This directive is only useful for Apache httpd proxy servers within intranets. The ProxyDomain directive specifies the default domain which the apache proxy server will belong to. If a request to a host without a domain name is encountered, a redirection response to the same host with the configured Domain appended will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 该指令仅对内部网中的Apache httpd代理服务器有用。该 ProxyDomain 指令指定了apache代理服务器将属于默认域。如果遇到对没有域名的主机的请求，将生成对附加了配置的 Domain 的同一主机的重定向响应。

trans-unit.source: This directive is recommended when you have a virtual filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 当你有一个虚拟文件系统时,建议使用此指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive is used as an alternate method of setting any of the parameters available to Proxy balancers and workers normally done via the ProxyPass directive. If used within a <Proxy balancer url|worker url> container directive, the url argument is not required. As a side effect the respective balancer or worker gets created. This can be useful when doing reverse proxying via a RewriteRule instead of a ProxyPass directive.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令用作设置通常可通过 ProxyPass 伪指令完成的对代理平衡器和工作者可用的任何参数的替代方法。如果在 <Proxy balancer url|worker url> 容器指令中使用，则不需要 url 参数。作为副作用，创建了各个平衡器或工人。通过 RewriteRule 而不是 ProxyPass 指令进行反向代理时，这很有用。

trans-unit.source: This directive is used to control how Apache httpd finds the interpreter used to run CGI scripts. For example, setting CGIMapExtension sys:\foo.nlm .foo will cause all CGI script files with a .foo extension to be passed to the FOO interpreter.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令用于控制Apache httpd如何查找用于运行CGI脚本的解释器。例如，设置 CGIMapExtension sys:\foo.nlm .foo 将导致所有带有 .foo 扩展名的CGI脚本文件传递到FOO解释器。

trans-unit.source: This directive is used to control how Apache httpd finds the interpreter used to run CGI scripts. The default setting is Script. This causes Apache httpd to use the interpreter pointed to by the shebang line (first line, starting with #!) in the script. On Win32 systems this line usually looks like:
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令用于控制Apache httpd如何查找用于运行CGI脚本的解释器。默认设置为 Script 。这将导致Apache httpd使用脚本中shebang行（第一行，从 #! 开头）指向的解释器。在Win32系统上，此行通常如下所示：

trans-unit.source: This directive is used to define a FastCGI application as a provider for a particular phase of authentication or authorization.
trans-unit.target: 该指令用于将FastCGI应用程序定义为某一阶段认证或授权的提供者。

trans-unit.source: This directive is used to enable a FastCGI authorizer to handle a specific processing phase of authentication or authorization.
trans-unit.target: 该指令用于使FastCGI授权者能够处理认证或授权的特定处理阶段。

trans-unit.source: This directive is useful for reverse-proxy setups where you want to have a common look and feel on the error pages seen by the end user. This also allows for included files (via mod_include's SSI) to get the error code and act accordingly. (Default behavior would display the error page of the proxied server. Turning this on shows the SSI Error message.)
trans-unit.target: 此指令对于要在最终用户看到的错误页面上具有通用外观的反向代理设置很有用。这还允许包含的文件（通过 mod_include 的SSI）获取错误代码并采取相应措施。（默认行为将显示代理服务器的错误页面。将其打开会显示SSI错误消息。）

trans-unit.source: This directive lets Apache httpd adjust the URL in the Location, Content-Location and URI headers on HTTP redirect responses. This is essential when Apache httpd is used as a reverse proxy (or gateway) to avoid bypassing the reverse proxy because of HTTP redirects on the backend servers which stay behind the reverse proxy.
trans-unit.target: 该指令使Apache httpd可以调整HTTP重定向响应中 Location ， Content-Location 和 URI 标头中的URL 。当Apache httpd用作反向代理（或网关）以避免由于反向服务器上的HTTP重定向位于反向代理后面而导致绕过反向代理时，这是必不可少的。

trans-unit.source: This directive limits the length of time to wait for more output from the CGI program. If the time is exceeded, the request and CGI are terminated.
trans-unit.target: 该指令限制了等待CGI程序更多输出的时间长度。如果超过了时间,请求和CGI就会被终止。

trans-unit.source: This directive makes the client know that the Redirect is only temporary (status 302). Exactly equivalent to Redirect temp.
trans-unit.target: 该指令使客户端知道重定向只是临时的（状态302）。完全等同于 Redirect temp 。

trans-unit.source: This directive makes the client know that the Redirect is permanent (status 301). Exactly equivalent to Redirect permanent.
trans-unit.target: 该指令使客户端知道重定向是永久的（状态301）。与 Redirect permanent 完全等效。

trans-unit.source: This directive matches a uri pattern to invoke a specific handler function in a specific file. It uses PCRE regular expressions to match the uri, and supports interpolating match groups into both the file path and the function name. Be careful writing your regular expressions to avoid security issues.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令匹配一个 uri 模式来调用特定文件中的特定处理函数。它使用 PCRE 正则表达式来匹配 uri,并支持将匹配组内插到文件路径和函数名称中。编写正则表达式时要小心,以免出现安全问题。

trans-unit.source: This directive may be used to register additional HTTP methods. This is necessary if non-standard methods need to be used with directives that accept method names as parameters, or to allow particular non-standard methods to be used via proxy or CGI script when the server has been configured to only pass recognized methods to modules.
trans-unit.target: 这个指令可以用来注册额外的HTTP方法。如果非标准方法需要与接受方法名作为参数的指令一起使用,或者当服务器被配置为只将认可的方法传递给模块时,允许通过代理或CGI脚本来使用特定的非标准方法,那么这个指令是必要的。

trans-unit.source: This directive only applies to requests which come from HTTP/1.0 browsers. HTTP/1.1 provides much better control over the caching of negotiated documents, and this directive has no effect in responses to HTTP/1.1 requests.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令只适用于来自HTTP/1.0浏览器的请求。HTTP/1.1对协商文件的缓存提供了更好的控制,这条指令对HTTP/1.1请求的响应没有影响。

trans-unit.source: This directive only configures mutexes which have been registered with the core server using the ap_mutex_register() API. All modules bundled with httpd support the Mutex directive, but third-party modules may not. Consult the documentation of the third-party module, which must indicate the mutex name(s) which can be configured if this directive is supported.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令仅配置已使用 ap_mutex_register() API 向核心服务器注册的互斥锁。与httpd捆绑在一起的所有模块都支持 Mutex 指令，但是第三方模块可能不支持。请查阅第三方模块的文档，该文档必须指示如果支持此伪指令可以配置的互斥量名称。

trans-unit.source: This directive only has effect on the comparisons performed during nested group processing when AuthLDAPCompareAsUser is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当还启用 AuthLDAPCompareAsUser 时，此伪指令仅对嵌套组处理期间执行的比较有效。

trans-unit.source: This directive only has effect on the comparisons performed during nested group processing when AuthLDAPSearchAsUser is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当还启用 AuthLDAPSearchAsUser 时，此伪指令仅对嵌套组处理期间执行的比较有效。

trans-unit.source: This directive only takes effect when the data is being saved to the cache, as opposed to data being served from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 这个指令只有在数据被保存到缓存中时才会生效,而不是从缓存中提供数据。

trans-unit.source: This directive only takes effect when the data is being saved to the cache, as opposed to data being served from the cache. It is recommended that this option be used alongside the CacheReadSize directive to ensure that the server does not buffer excessively should data arrive faster than expected.
trans-unit.target: 该指令仅在将数据保存到缓存中时才生效，而不是从缓存中提供数据。建议将此选项与 CacheReadSize 伪指令一起使用，以确保如果数据到达速度比预期的更快，则服务器不会过多缓冲。

trans-unit.source: This directive only takes effect when the data is being saved to the cache, as opposed to data being served from the cache. It is recommended that this option be used alongside the CacheSocacheReadSize directive to ensure that the server does not buffer excessively should data arrive faster than expected.
trans-unit.target: 该指令仅在将数据保存到缓存中时才生效，而不是从缓存中提供数据。建议将此选项与 CacheSocacheReadSize 指令一起使用，以确保如果数据到达速度比预期的更快，则服务器不会过多缓冲。

trans-unit.source: This directive overrides the URI of an OCSP responder as obtained from the authorityInfoAccess (AIA) extension of the certificate. One potential use is when a proxy is used for retrieving OCSP queries.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令覆盖了从证书的authorityInfoAccess(AIA)扩展中获得的OCSP响应者的URI。一个潜在的用途是当一个代理被用于检索OCSP查询时,这个指令将覆盖OCSP响应者的URI。

trans-unit.source: This directive overrides the behavior of TRACE for both the core server and mod_proxy. The default TraceEnable on permits TRACE requests per RFC 2616, which disallows any request body to accompany the request. TraceEnable off causes the core server and mod_proxy to return a 405 (Method not allowed) error to the client.
trans-unit.target: 该指令覆盖了核心服务器和 mod_proxy 的 TRACE 行为。默认的 TraceEnable on 允许根据RFC 2616 进行 TRACE 请求，该请求不允许任何请求正文伴随该请求。 TraceEnable off 会导致核心服务器和 mod_proxy 向客户端返回 405 （不允许使用方法）错误。

trans-unit.source: This directive points to a file with certificate data in PEM format. At a minimum, the file must include an end-entity (leaf) certificate. The directive can be used multiple times (referencing different filenames) to support multiple algorithms for server authentication - typically RSA, DSA, and ECC. The number of supported algorithms depends on the OpenSSL version being used for mod_ssl: with version 1.0.0 or later, openssl list-public-key-algorithms will output a list of supported algorithms, see also the note below about limitations of OpenSSL versions prior to 1.0.2 and the ways to work around them.
trans-unit.target: 该指令指向带有PEM格式的证书数据的文件。至少，文件必须包含最终实体（叶子）证书。该指令可以多次使用（引用不同的文件名）以支持用于服务器认证的多种算法-通常为RSA，DSA和ECC。支持的算法数量取决于用于mod_ssl的OpenSSL版本：在1.0.0或更高版本中， openssl list-public-key-algorithms 将输出支持的算法列表，另请参见以下有关以前的OpenSSL版本限制的说明1.0.2以及解决这些问题的方法。

trans-unit.source: This directive points to the PEM-encoded private key file for the server. If the contained private key is encrypted, the pass phrase dialog is forced at startup time.
trans-unit.target: 该指令指向服务器的PEM编码私钥文件。如果包含的私钥是加密的,那么在启动时就会强制执行传递短语对话框。

trans-unit.source: This directive primarily configures the content types generated for static files served out of the filesystem. For resources other than static files, where the generator of the response typically specifies a Content-Type, this directive has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令主要是配置从文件系统中服务出来的静态文件所生成的内容类型,对于静态文件以外的资源,响应生成器通常会指定Content-Type,这条指令没有任何作用。对于静态文件以外的资源,响应生成器通常会指定一个Content-Type,这条指令没有效果。

trans-unit.source: This directive primarily overrides the content types generated for static files served out of the filesystem. For resources other than static files, where the generator of the response typically specifies a Content-Type, this directive has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令主要是覆盖为文件系统外的静态文件生成的内容类型。对于静态文件以外的资源,响应的生成器通常会指定一个Content-Type,这条指令没有效果。

trans-unit.source: This directive provides a hook for the type_checker phase of the request processing. This phase is where requests are assigned a content type and a handler, and thus can be used to modify the type and handler based on input:
trans-unit.target: 这条指令为请求处理的type_checker阶段提供了一个钩子。在这个阶段,请求被分配给一个内容类型和一个处理程序,因此可以用来根据输入修改类型和处理程序。

trans-unit.source: This directive pushes resources much earlier than adding Link headers via mod_headers. mod_http2 announces these resources in a 103 Early Hints interim response to the client. That means that clients not supporting PUSH will still get early preload hints.
trans-unit.target: 该指令比通过 mod_headers 添加 Link 头更早地推送资源。 mod_http2 在对客户端的 103 Early Hints 临时响应中宣布了这些资源。这意味着不支持PUSH的客户端仍将获得早期的预加载提示。

trans-unit.source: This directive registers a provider for the smart filter. The provider will be called if and only if the expression declared evaluates to true when the harness is first called.
trans-unit.target: 该指令注册了智能过滤器的提供程序。当且仅当第一次调用线束时声明的 expression 值为true时，才会调用提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This directive selects the type of user authentication for a directory. The authentication types available are None, Basic (implemented by mod_auth_basic), Digest (implemented by mod_auth_digest), and Form (implemented by mod_auth_form).
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令选择目录的用户认证类型。可用的身份验证类型为 None ， Basic （由 mod_auth_basic 实现）， Digest （由 mod_auth_digest 实现）和 Form （由 mod_auth_form 实现）。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets how deeply mod_ssl should verify before deciding that the clients don't have a valid certificate. Notice that this directive can be used both in per-server and per-directory context. In per-server context it applies to the client authentication process used in the standard SSL handshake when a connection is established. In per-directory context it forces a SSL renegotiation with the reconfigured client verification depth after the HTTP request was read but before the HTTP response is sent.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了mod_ssl在决定客户机没有有效证书之前应该进行多深的验证。请注意,这条指令既可以在每台服务器上使用,也可以在每一个目录下使用。在per-server上下文中,它适用于建立连接时标准SSL握手中使用的客户端验证过程。在每目录上下文中,它在读取HTTP请求后,但在发送HTTP响应之前,强制与重新配置的客户端验证深度进行SSL重新协商。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets how deeply mod_ssl should verify before deciding that the remote server does not have a valid certificate.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了在决定远程服务器没有有效证书之前,mod_ssl应该进行多深的验证。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the "user" field in the Apache request object. This is used by lower modules to identify the user with a character string. In particular, this may cause the environment variable REMOTE_USER to be set. The varname can be any of the SSL environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令在Apache请求对象中设置“用户”字段。较低的模块使用它来识别带有字符串的用户。特别是，这可能导致设置环境变量 REMOTE_USER 。该VARNAME可以是任何的SSL环境变量。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you can assemble the Certificate Revocation Lists (CRL) of Certification Authorities (CA) whose clients you deal with. These are used for Client Authentication. Such a file is simply the concatenation of the various PEM-encoded CRL files, in order of preference. This can be used alternatively and/or additionally to SSLCARevocationPath.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置了一个多文件，您可以在其中汇编与您处理其客户的证书颁发机构（CA）的证书吊销列表（CRL）。这些用于客户端身份验证。按照优先顺序，此类文件只是各种PEM编码的CRL文件的串联。可以替代和/或附加使用 SSLCARevocationPath 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you can assemble the Certificate Revocation Lists (CRL) of Certification Authorities (CA) whose remote servers you deal with. These are used for Remote Server Authentication. Such a file is simply the concatenation of the various PEM-encoded CRL files, in order of preference. This can be used alternatively and/or additionally to SSLProxyCARevocationPath.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置了一个多文件，您可以在其中汇编要处理其远程服务器的证书颁发机构（CA）的证书吊销列表（CRL）。这些用于远程服务器身份验证。按照优先顺序，此类文件只是各种PEM编码的CRL文件的串联。可以替代和/或附加使用 SSLProxyCARevocationPath 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you can assemble the Certificates of Certification Authorities (CA) whose clients you deal with. These are used for Client Authentication. Such a file is simply the concatenation of the various PEM-encoded Certificate files, in order of preference. This can be used alternatively and/or additionally to SSLCACertificatePath.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置了一个多文件，您可以在其中汇编与您处理其客户的证书颁发机构（CA）证书。这些用于客户端身份验证。按照优先顺序，此文件只是各种PEM编码的证书文件的串联。可以替代和/或附加使用 SSLCACertificatePath 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you can assemble the Certificates of Certification Authorities (CA) whose remote servers you deal with. These are used for Remote Server Authentication. Such a file is simply the concatenation of the various PEM-encoded Certificate files, in order of preference. This can be used alternatively and/or additionally to SSLProxyCACertificatePath.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置了一个多文件，您可以在其中汇编要处理其远程服务器的证书颁发机构（CA）证书。这些用于远程服务器身份验证。按照优先顺序，此文件只是各种PEM编码的证书文件的串联。可以替代和/或附加使用 SSLProxyCACertificatePath 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the Certificate verification level for the Client Authentication. Notice that this directive can be used both in per-server and per-directory context. In per-server context it applies to the client authentication process used in the standard SSL handshake when a connection is established. In per-directory context it forces a SSL renegotiation with the reconfigured client verification level after the HTTP request was read but before the HTTP response is sent.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置客户端认证的证书验证级别。请注意,这条指令既可用于每服务器,也可用于每目录。在每服务器上下文中,它适用于建立连接时标准SSL握手中使用的客户端验证过程。在每目录上下文中,它在读取HTTP请求后,但在发送HTTP响应之前,强制与重新配置的客户端验证级别进行SSL重新协商。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you keep the certificate chain for all of the client certs in use. This directive will be needed if the remote server presents a list of CA certificates that are not direct signers of one of the configured client certificates.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存所有正在使用的客户端证书的证书链的一体化文件,如果远程服务器提交的CA证书列表不是其中一个配置的客户端证书的直接签署者,则需要这条指令。如果远程服务器提交的CA证书列表不是配置的客户端证书的直接签署者,则需要这条指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the all-in-one file where you keep the certificates and keys used for authentication of the proxy server to remote servers.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存用于代理服务器对远程服务器进行认证的证书和密钥的一体化文件。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the default algorithm for calculating the expiration time for all documents in the affected realm. It can be overridden on a type-by-type basis by the ExpiresByType directive. See the description of that directive for details about the syntax of the argument, and the alternate syntax description as well.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置默认算法，用于计算受影响领域中所有文档的到期时间。可以使用 ExpiresByType 伪指令逐个覆盖它。有关参数语法的详细信息以及替代语法描述，请参见该指令的描述。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory from which httpd will serve files. Unless matched by a directive like Alias, the server appends the path from the requested URL to the document root to make the path to the document. Example:
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置 httpd 将从中提供文件的目录。除非通过与 Alias 之类的指令匹配，否则服务器会将从请求的URL到文档根目录的路径附加到该文档的路径中。例：

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory where you keep the Certificate Revocation Lists (CRL) of Certification Authorities (CAs) whose clients you deal with. These are used to revoke the client certificate on Client Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存与客户打交道的认证机构(CA)的证书撤销列表(CRL)的目录。这些列表用于在客户端认证时撤销客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory where you keep the Certificate Revocation Lists (CRL) of Certification Authorities (CAs) whose remote servers you deal with. These are used to revoke the remote server certificate on Remote Server Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存与你打交道的远程服务器的认证机构(CA)的证书撤销列表(CRL)的目录。这些列表用于在远程服务器认证时撤销远程服务器的证书。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory where you keep the Certificates of Certification Authorities (CAs) whose clients you deal with. These are used to verify the client certificate on Client Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存与客户打交道的认证机构(CA)证书的目录。这些证书用于验证客户端认证时的客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory where you keep the Certificates of Certification Authorities (CAs) whose remote servers you deal with. These are used to verify the remote server certificate on Remote Server Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存与你打交道的远程服务器的认证机构(CA)证书的目录。这些证书用于验证远程服务器认证时的远程服务器证书。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the directory where you keep the certificates and keys used for authentication of the proxy server to remote servers.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了保存用于代理服务器对远程服务器进行认证的证书和密钥的目录。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the filename prefix of the socket to use for communication with the CGI daemon, an extension corresponding to the process ID of the server will be appended. The socket will be opened using the permissions of the user who starts Apache (usually root). To maintain the security of communications with CGI scripts, it is important that no other user has permission to write in the directory where the socket is located.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了用于与CGI守护进程通信的套接字的文件名前缀,将附加一个与服务器的进程ID相对应的扩展名。套接字将使用启动Apache的用户(通常是root)的权限打开。为了维护与CGI脚本通信的安全性,重要的是没有其他用户有权限在套接字所在的目录中写入。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the maximum configured value for ThreadsPerChild for the lifetime of the Apache httpd process. Any attempts to change this directive during a restart will be ignored, but ThreadsPerChild can be modified during a restart up to the value of this directive.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令为Apache httpd进程的生存期设置 ThreadsPerChild 的最大配置值。重新启动期间更改此指令的任何尝试都将被忽略，但是 ThreadsPerChild 可以在重新启动期间进行修改，直到该指令的值。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the maximum number of active streams per HTTP/2 session (e.g. connection) that the server allows. A stream is active if it is not idle or closed according to RFC 7540.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置服务器允许的每个HTTP / 2会话（例如连接）的最大活动流数。根据RFC 7540，如果流不是 idle 或 closed ，则该流是活动的。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the maximum number of outgoing data bytes buffered in memory for an active streams. This memory is not allocated per stream as such. Allocations are counted against this limit when they are about to be done. Stream processing freezes when the limit has been reached and will only continue when buffered data has been sent out to the client.
trans-unit.target: 此指令设置活动流在内存中缓冲的最大数据字节数。该内存不是按流分配的。当分配即将完成时,会根据这个限制进行计算。当达到该限制时,流处理就会冻结,只有当缓冲数据被发送到客户端时,流处理才会继续。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the maximum number of seconds a h2 worker may idle until it shuts itself down. This only happens while the number of h2 workers exceeds H2MinWorkers.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置了h2 worker可以关闭直到关闭自身的最大秒数。仅在h2工人数超过 H2MinWorkers 时发生。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the maximum number of worker threads to spawn per child process for HTTP/2 processing. If this directive is not used, mod_http2 will chose a value suitable for the mpm module loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置每个子进程为HTTP / 2处理生成的最大工作线程数。如果不使用此指令，则 mod_http2 将选择一个适合于所加载的 mpm 模块的值。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the minimum number of worker threads to spawn per child process for HTTP/2 processing. If this directive is not used, mod_http2 will chose a value suitable for the mpm module loaded.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置每个子进程为HTTP / 2处理生成的最小工作线程数。如果不使用此指令，则 mod_http2 将选择一个适合于所加载的 mpm 模块的值。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the name of the authorization realm for a directory. This realm is given to the client so that the user knows which username and password to send. AuthName takes a single argument; if the realm name contains spaces, it must be enclosed in quotation marks. It must be accompanied by AuthType and Require directives, and directives such as AuthUserFile and AuthGroupFile to work.
trans-unit.target: 该伪指令设置目录的授权领域的名称。该领域被提供给客户端，以便用户知道要发送的用户名和密码。 AuthName 有一个参数；如果领域名称包含空格，则必须将其用引号引起来。它必须与 AuthType 和 Require 指令以及 AuthUserFile 和 AuthGroupFile 等指令一起使用。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the number of <var>bytes</var> that will be allowed on the HTTP request-line.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置HTTP请求行上允许的 <var>bytes</var> 数。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the number of bytes to be sent in small TLS records (~1300 bytes) until doing maximum sized writes (16k) on https: HTTP/2 connections. This can be used server wide or for specific <VirtualHost>s.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置在TLS小记录（〜1300字节）中发送的字节数，直到在https：HTTP / 2连接上进行最大大小的写操作（16k）为止。可以在服务器范围内使用，也可以用于特定的 <VirtualHost> 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the number of seconds of idle time on a TLS connection before the TLS write size falls back to small (~1300 bytes) length. This can be used server wide or for specific <VirtualHost>s.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置TLS连接上的空闲时间的秒数，直到TLS写入大小变小（〜1300字节）。可以在服务器范围内使用，也可以用于特定的 <VirtualHost> 。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the number of threads created by each child process. The child creates these threads at startup and never creates more. If using an MPM like mpm_winnt, where there is only one child process, this number should be high enough to handle the entire load of the server. If using an MPM like worker, where there are multiple child processes, the total number of threads should be high enough to handle the common load on the server.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置每个子进程创建的线程数。子级在启动时创建这些线程，而从不创建更多线程。如果使用的是 mpm_winnt 之类的MPM ，其中只有一个子进程，则此数字应足够大以处理服务器的整个负载。如果使用MPM之类的 worker ，其中有多个子进程，则线程总数应足够高以处理服务器上的常见负载。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the optional all-in-one file where you can assemble the certificates of Certification Authorities (CA) which form the certificate chain of the server certificate. This starts with the issuing CA certificate of the server certificate and can range up to the root CA certificate. Such a file is simply the concatenation of the various PEM-encoded CA Certificate files, usually in certificate chain order.
trans-unit.target: 此伪指令设置可选的多合一文件，您可以在其中组装构成服务器证书的证书链的证书颁发机构（CA）的证书。这从服务器证书的颁发CA证书开始，并且可以扩展到根CA证书。这样的文件只是各种PEM编码的CA证书文件的串联，通常以证书链顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the seed used to fake SRP user parameters for unknown users, to avoid leaking whether a given user exists. Specify a secret string. If this directive is not used, then Apache will return the UNKNOWN_PSK_IDENTITY alert to clients who specify an unknown username.
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了用于伪造未知用户的SRP用户参数的种子,以避免泄露某个用户是否存在。指定一个秘密字符串。如果不使用这条指令,那么Apache将向指定未知用户名的客户端返回UNKNOWN_PSK_IDENTITY警报。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the size of the window that is used for flow control from client to server and limits the amount of data the server has to buffer. The client will stop sending on a stream once the limit has been reached until the server announces more available space (as it has processed some of the data).
trans-unit.target: 这条指令设置了用于从客户端到服务器的流控制的窗口大小,并限制了服务器可缓冲的数据量。一旦达到限制,客户端就会停止在流上发送,直到服务器宣布更多的可用空间(因为它已经处理了一些数据)。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets the timeout in seconds for the information stored in the global/inter-process SSL Session Cache, the OpenSSL internal memory cache and for sessions resumed by TLS session resumption (RFC 5077). It can be set as low as 15 for testing, but should be set to higher values like 300 in real life.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置了存储在全局/进程间SSL会话缓存、OpenSSL内部内存缓存以及通过TLS会话恢复(RFC 5077)恢复的会话的信息超时时间,单位为秒。在测试中,它可以设置为低至15,但在实际生活中应该设置为更高的值,如300。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets whether a non-SNI client is allowed to access a name-based virtual host. If set to on in the default name-based virtual host, clients that are SNI unaware will not be allowed to access any virtual host, belonging to this particular IP / port combination. If set to on in any other virtual host, SNI unaware clients are not allowed to access this particular virtual host.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置是否允许非SNI客户端访问基于名称的虚拟主机。如果在默认的基于名称的虚拟主机中设置为 on ，则不允许SNI不感知的客户端访问属于此特定IP /端口组合的任何虚拟主机。如果在任何其他虚拟主机中将其设置为 on ，则不允许SNI不知道的客户端访问此特定虚拟主机。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets whether it is checked if the remote server certificate is expired or not. If the check fails a 502 status code (Bad Gateway) is sent.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置是否检查远程服务器证书是否过期。如果检查失败,将发送502状态码(坏网关)。

trans-unit.source: This directive sets whether the remote server certificate's CN field is compared against the hostname of the request URL. If both are not equal a 502 status code (Bad Gateway) is sent. SSLProxyCheckPeerCN is superseded by SSLProxyCheckPeerName in release 2.4.5 and later.
trans-unit.target: 该指令设置是否将远程服务器证书的CN字段与请求URL的主机名进行比较。如果两者不相等，则会发送502状态代码（错误网关）。 SSLProxyCheckPeerCN 被取代 SSLProxyCheckPeerName 在发布2.4.5及更高版本。

trans-unit.source: This directive should be used with caution as a crash might cause loss of logging data.
trans-unit.target: 此指令应谨慎使用,因为崩溃可能会导致记录数据的丢失。

trans-unit.source: This directive should only be used when your LDAP server doesn't accept anonymous comparisons and you cannot use a dedicated AuthLDAPBindDN.
trans-unit.target: 仅当LDAP服务器不接受匿名比较并且您不能使用专用的 AuthLDAPBindDN 时，才应使用此伪指令。

trans-unit.source: This directive should only be used when your LDAP server doesn't accept anonymous searches and you cannot use a dedicated AuthLDAPBindDN.
trans-unit.target: 仅当LDAP服务器不接受匿名搜索并且您不能使用专用的 AuthLDAPBindDN 时，才应使用此伪指令。
